snippet: The continuing labor dispute at the Minnesota Orchestra, which had already caused the cancellation of the 2012-13 season, now claims a series of summer concerts as well.
abstract: The continuing labor dispute at the Minnesota Orchestra, which had already caused the cancellation of the 2012-13 season, now claims a series of summer concerts as well.

headline.main: As Labor Dispute Drags On, Minnesota Orchestra Cancels Summer Concerts
headline.print_headline: Minnesota Concerts Are Canceled in Dispute
